official_title: A concurrent resolution disapproving The Federal Trade Commission Trade Regulation Rule Relating To The Sale of Used Motor Vehicles.

summary.text: Disapproves the final rule promulgated by the Federal Trade Commission dealing with the matter of the trade regulation rule relating to the sale of used motor vehicles.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution disapproving The Federal Trade Commission Trade Regulation Rule Relating To The Sale of Used Motor Vehicles.
